item.title: Who Drives Europe's Value Chain?
item.description: Introduction International trade has been a The purpose of this post is to illuminate, which countries and regions are the major trade partners of the EU. Data library(dplyr) load("WIOT2014_October16_ROW.RData") Countries temp <- wiot %>% gather(key = "country_id", value = "value", -(IndustryCode:Year)) Sectors
